content.content: Oi, tudo bem? Olha só o que eu encontrei:

product.title: TAMASHII NATIONS - Dragon Ball Super - Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan Vegeta -Unwavering Saiyan Pride- S.H.Figuarts Action Figure
product.description: Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan VEGETA from "DRAGON BALL SUPER" appears in S.H.Figuarts!, This figure features new modeling and coloring to better represent the reflection of his aura!, [Set Contents] Main body, 3 interchangeable faces, Interchangeable hands (3 left, 4 right), Interchangeable folded arms, The product box will have a Bandai Namco warning label, which is proof that you are purchasing an officially licensed product
